label: 中倉
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
説明文: The central division of the Hōko (Treasure Repository) , in the Shōsō-in at Tōdai-ji in Nara. The Middle Section is sided with thich boards (itakura) , as opposed to the loghouse (azekura) construction of the North and South Sections. [宝庫、正倉院、東大寺、板倉、校倉]
